nodes.text: An individual served as a senator in the Galactic Senate of the Galactic Republic sometime before the beginning of the Great Galactic War between the Republic and the Sith Empire. During the senator's career, one of the senator's aides was the partner of the astromech droid T7-O1 for some amount of time.

The senator was first mentioned by T7-O1, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. In the conversation "Master Zallow," T7-O1 names the aide of the senator as one of his previous partners, though he does not specify the name, species, or gender of either the senator or the aide.
